original_title: Thuggin' It & Lovin' It Part 2: Tha Sequel
overview: The highly anticipated followup to Troy Da Triggaman's wildly popular and successful underground masterpiece "Thuggin' It & Lovin' It" an intimate look into the life of Southern hip-hop & rap culture, street life in the projects, and a whole lotta gang sh*t mane
tagline: GO ON A RIDE THROUGH THE GUTTER & GRIMY STREETS OF BATON ROUGE
title: Thuggin' It & Lovin' It Part 2: Tha Sequel
